original_text: Many years ago, there were false prophets among God's people. They did not speak God's true messages. In the same way, there will also be false teachers among you. They will come among you and they will teach you things that are not true. Their wrong ideas will deceive people. Those false teachers will even speak against the Master, who paid the price for their sins. As a result, they will bring trouble on themselves that quickly destroys them.
korean_text: 그러나 백성 가운데 또한 거짓 선지자들이 일어났었나니 이와 같이 너희 중에도 거짓 선생들이 있으리라 그들은 멸망하게 할 이단을 가만히 끌어들여 자기들을 사신 주를 부인하고 임박한 멸망을 스스로 취하는 자들이라

sentences.original_text: Many years ago, there were false prophets among God's people.
sentences.korean_translation: 오래전에 하나님의 백성 가운데 거짓 선지자들이 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They did not speak God's true messages.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님의 참된 메시지를 전하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: In the same way, there will also be false teachers among you.
sentences.korean_translation: 같은 방식으로, 너희 가운데도 거짓 교사들이 있을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: and they will teach you things that are not true.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 너희에게 참되지 않은 것들을 가르칠 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Their wrong ideas will deceive people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 잘못된 생각들이 사람들을 속일 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Those false teachers will even speak against the Master
sentences.korean_translation: 그 거짓 교사들은 심지어 주님을 반대하여 말할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: who paid the price for their sins.
As a result, they will bring trouble on themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 결과적으로, 그들은 자신들에게 재난을 가져올 것입니다.
